News.headline: Match Preview: Dover Athletic v Dagenham and Redbridge
News.page_title: Match Preview: Dover Athletic v Dagenham and Redbridge
News.URL_keywords: Match Preview: Dover Athletic v Dagenham and Redbridge
News.short_description: A preview of the Daggers Vanarama National League fixture against Dover Athletic on Saturday.
News.description:
The Daggers will be looking to get back to winning ways after two defeats on the bounce. 

Dover Athletic are 5th in the table and one place and one point above the Daggers going into Saturday’s game. 

Previous 5 Results

Daggers
Daggers 0-1 Torquay United
Daggers 1-4 Barrow
Maidstone 0-1 Daggers 
York 0-2 Daggers 
Halifax 2-1 Daggers (Emirates FA Cup) 

Dover Athletic
Sutton United 0-6 Dover Athletic
Macclesfield A-A Dover Athletic
Dover Athletic 3-1 Woking
Dover Athletic 2-0 Guiseley 
Dover Athletic 2-4 Cambridge (Emirates FA Cup)

Team News
The Daggers will be without a number of players for Saturday. Okenabirhie, Robson, Williams, Howell, Pennell, Ling and Robinson are all set to miss out. 

Previous Meetings
This will be the twelfth meeting between the two teams, with the Daggers winning seven of the previous encounters and losing once on New Year’s Day 2001. 

Fixtures
There are only six Vanarama National League games this Saturday, with some teams in the National League still in the Emirates FA Cup. All 3:00pm KO’s. 

Alldershot Town v Boreham Wood
Bromley v Maidstone
Dover v Dagenham and Redbridge
Guiseley v Chester FC
North Ferriby United v Gateshead
Tranmere v York City  

Tickets
Ticket information for the game can be found here.

Social Media & Online
Follow the Daggers on Twitter for live updates throughout the match (@Dag_RedFC). There will also be updates on our Facebookpage (OfficialDaggers). After the match there will be a match report on the webs
